extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected TwinCAT Driver Version
extracted_playbook.description: Determine if the system is using an affected version of the TwinCAT Driver for Intel 8254x or 8255x.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system using an affected TwinCAT Driver version?
Is real-time communication from TwinCAT required on the Ethernet interface?

extracted_playbook.title: Re-configure Ethernet Interface to Use Intel Driver
extracted_playbook.description: Re-configure the Ethernet interface to use the Intel driver shipped with Beckhoff images if real-time communication is not required.

extracted_playbook.title: Request and Apply Software Patch from Beckhoff
extracted_playbook.description: Contact Beckhoff to request the software patch for TwinCAT 3.1 or TwinCAT 2.11 and apply it to the affected system.

extracted_playbook.title: Configure Perimeter Firewall
extracted_playbook.description: Configure a perimeter firewall to block traffic from untrusted networks to the device, focusing on ICMP and other small ethernet frames.
